alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Comanche, southern Grady and southeastern Caddo Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Cement, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Rush Springs, Alex, Cement, Norge, Bradley, Agawam, Ninnekah, Acme, Cox City, and Laverty. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 63 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
